title: Police identify man killed in Liberty City shooting
content:
MIAMI - A man who was killed in a Liberty City shooting over the weekend has been identified as Vincent Miller, 49.
Three others were injured in the Saturday night shooting near Northwest 54th Street and 14th Avenue.
Miami police said Miller was rushed to Jackson Memorial Hospital's Ryder Trauma Center where he died from his injuries.
The three other victims were also taken to the hospital, where they were still recovering on Sunday.
Police said a motive for the shooting wasn't immediately known.
